name: Plump Shot™ Collagen-Infused Lip Serum Plumper
about: What it is:A collagen-infused lip serum clinically shown to visibly plump lips and decrease the appearance of fine lines—plus it now comes in sparkling shades..Formulation Type:Lip Gloss & Lip Plumper.Benefits:Plumping.Highlighted Ingredients:- Pure Vegan Collagen: Helps promote fuller-looking lips over time..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens and mineral oil. It is also cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:This clear, soft-shine lip serum contains a volumizing blend of pure vegan collagen, tripeptides, and hyaluronic acid filling spheres for a plumping tingle. Hydrating oils help smooth the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, while two 3-D sparkle shades transform lips with dimensional shine..Clinical Results:In a US consumer study of 30 women:
ingredients: -Pure Vegan Collagen: Helps promote fuller-looking lips over time..-Hyaluronic Acid Filling Spheres: Smooths the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles..-Tripeptides: Promote fuller-looking lips over time...Hydrogenated Poly(C6-14 Olefin), Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Ethylene/Propylene/Styrene Copolymer, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Collagen, Camellia Japonica Seed Oil, Benzyl Nicotinate, Menthone Glycerin Acetal, Sodium Hyaluronate, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Portulaca Pilosa Extract, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-38, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, Butylene/Ethylene/Styrene Copolymer, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Butylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Hexylene Glycol, Tribehenin, Sorbitan Isostearate, Lactic Acid, Tocopheryl Acetate, Cetearyl Ethylhexanoate, Sucrose Cocoate, Water (Aqua/Eau), Alcohol, Vanillin, Limonene, Phenoxyethanol.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Wear alone as your lip treatment or clear lip gloss, over lip color, or mixed into your favorite Full-On™ Plumping Lip Polish Gloss or Plumping Lip Cream Gloss (each sold separately) to fill them with more plumping power. .-For the ultimate plumping lip care, start by gently exfoliating lips with the Power-full Lip Scrub (sold separately), add utter hydration with Power-Full Plump Lip Balm (sold separately), then layer on top with Plump Shot™ Collagen-Infused Lip Serum. .-Apply a thin layer of Plump Shot™ to lips if using before bed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This quite literally showed no results, I even attempted to leave it on for a while and layer it. Save the money and use two faced lip plumper

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product visibly plumped my lips from thin to plump. It is so good and probably my new favorite lip plumper. I 100% recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: NOOO THIS MADE ME BREAKOUT SOOOO BAD! i love all of buxoms other products but as soon as put this on my lips burned so bad and ik what plumpers are supposed to feel like. a few minutes after applying i got a huge red swollen rash around my lips and on my hand where i attempted to get it off. after

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This serum delivers noticeable plumping effects, giving my lips a fuller, more voluminous look. The formula is smooth and hydrating, making my lips feel soft and nourished. I love the slight tingling sensation that lets me know it's working. It's perfect for adding an extra boost to your pout without feeling sticky or uncomfortable. Highly recommend for anyone looking to enhance their lips with a plumping effect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not worth $29 at all!! The Sephora brand is less expensive and is 10x better. If I could return this, I would!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super smooth and not sticky/tacky at all, but the color didn’t last very long (which is super disappointing because i rly loved the shade) and not plumping at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. I've been using it every day before I leave my home. Barely feel any tingle and love the subtle results. I have sensitive skin and have no problem using this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Don’t buy this!! I’ve been a huge fan of Buxom for years & this gloss destroyed my lips. I tried mine over a week ago and my lips are still on fire (no joke) beyond cracked & in so much pain. Horrible reaction

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_text: So 1: in stores, there is this instead of the Haus labs lip oil, and 2: after using this twice, I realized that it was burning my face and causing serious redness and stinging around the corners of my lips! Doesn’t even plump! Don’t jet this and spare your skin!!

The plumping effect can be subtle or less subtle depending on how much product you use, also when I want a more dramatic result I apply it once WSIT till I don’t feel anything happening anymore and then I apply a second time

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: Received this in the Summer Showstoppers Kit. I love it compared to Too Faced & other brands I’ve tried. Goes on so smoothly and feels hydrating. Doesn’t sting or burn too bad, just a nice tingle and smells like peppermint!  Want to try a different color!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: NO. Burns extremely, hit me like a brick wall, then left surrounding areas of my lips red. (I got a clear one in a kit, but could not find the kit, so it’s not just the color of the lipgloss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It definitely PLUMPS love the applicator and that it's not super sticky and it doesn't smell bad

reviews.review_text: i have used this product for about a week now and have seen amazing plumping results on every use! it gives the perfect glossy look as well as plumping. it is a bit intense though.      this is

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The perfect amount of tingle and gloss. I’ve tried many others and they dry out lips and leave redness around mouth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has been my go-to for years and it still can’t be beat. The plump isn’t painful but you definitely feel it working. The formula is so smooth and moisturizing and smells amazing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Normally if I don’t care for a product I don’t review it because just because it didn’t work for me doesn’t mean it won’t work for anyone else. But, this one really didn’t work! When I first applied it I liked the spicy feeling, but when I looked in the mirror after a few minutes I had a red ring around my mouth, way beyond my lip line. I ended up wiping it off and trying it again a few hours later, same thing happened again. The next morning I woke up with clusters of tiny pimples around my mouth. Luckily Sephora has an awesome return policy:)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for weeks and I do not see any difference. I don't like the packaging or the applicator it comes with. For it to be the most expensive lip plumper in store it felt cheap.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this but it’s not very plumping. It’s a nice formula, I like how it wears, it’s not like super super glossy but gives the lips a healthy look. This is perfect for everyday but a not full glam lip

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This gloss is very silky almost. The consistency is like a smooth jelly and it feels amazing on the lips! It has a  cooling sensation and it doesn’t burn! It makes my lips plump! I love this stuff!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loooove but not for everyone. It definitely burns and tingles like little prickly. But it plumps your lips for sure

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I never reach for this product because of how it reacts if it touches the skin around my mouth. It creates red splotches around my mouth which look like the results of a fresh wax. Wayyy too troubling to have to constantly make sure the product isn’t making contact with any skin around the mouth. Hard pass for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It works…but I get reaction like many other reviewers have. Wouldn’t buy again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got the clear and use regular lipstick for variation. By far the B E S T lip plump I’ve used. Warning: it’s POWERFUL. Only put on lips and avoid kissing anyone for about 15 minutes after application lol 😅

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love the clear one and wanted a light beige lip gloss so I got get naked. It turned very orange on me and was also very dark. The color is not what I expected so I will be returning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: for anyone having doubts, get this!! it may be a little pricey but it is worth it.. it does only have a subtle plump (for me at least) but it also is really glossy (my fav gloss actually and long lasting), has a good like sweet minty smell, and it brings out a good color to ur lips🤗🤗

reviews.review_title: nice lip gloss, but minimal plumping
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s a nice lip gloss, goes on very smooth, light color, not too sticky, and leaves lips feeling moisturized after the glossiness is gone. I wasn’t wowed by the plumping, however. There is very minimal tingling, so if the tingling / burning sensation of other plumping glosses bothers you, you’d probably like this one just fine, but I personally like to feel it “working” a bit more.  Top photo is before application, middle is immediately after I put it on, and bottom pic is about 15 minutes after applying the gloss. There’s some plumping, but very minimal. On the fence if I’ll return to try something else or keep because it’s still a nice gloss. If you’re looking for something that’s really going to make your lips pop, this isn’t it, but if you’re just looking for a moisturizing gloss with a pretty sheen, you’ll love this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Major rash all over my mouth, up to around my nose, same as I see on the photos of the reviews.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: after seeing the reviews of people with their lips burned off i thought this product was going to be MAXXED out on plumping, i wouldn’t consider it stronger than lip injection max but it’s still lovely (:

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely makes my lips look so plump shiny and cute. I love it so much and it doesn't completely set you lips on fire.

reviews.review_title: Caused lower lip to swell & redden.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought it a few weeks back to put over lipstick. Looked great and stayed put.  Today I decided to wear it solo. Some of it spread below my lower lip line and I could feel the area swell. Not sure if not having the barrier from the lipstick has caused an issue but it my lower lip feels enormous. Going in the trash bin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing! The color it gives my lips is so pretty. Works really well. The tingle isn’t at all painful-just slightly spicy. Had to buy another. Only complaint is that this tube didn’t look full.

reviews.review_buyer_description: red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Use with caution. Ive used Buxom products for years but this Plum Shot absolutely awful. Waste of $28.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Purchased the Clear one. This does plump your lips!  It does tingle - not as much as the Too Faced Lip Injections do, so if they're too strong, this is a step down and you would like this.  I took off one star, because it's not as shiny/glossy as I would like.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Allergy. I use Buxom gloss every day without issue, so I’m surprised to have a reaction to this, but I do. I tried it on the back of my hand to see if it was just the extra plump that felt weird, but my hand got red and itchy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this so much, but this HURT!  My lips were red and the skin around them was angry and bumpy.  I woke up with a sore right under my lower lip the next day.  When the sore was gone I tried it again, just a little around the inside of the lips after lipliner.  Wasn't too bad like this, so I'm going to finish the tube, but will more than likely not purchase it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite plumper in the entire world. I saw somewhere that it said it was going to be limited edition and I’m so glad it’s not because I will continue to repurchase forever

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a wee sample of this stuff, and I must say it's amazing! I much prefer the texture and smell of this over the too faced lip injection. It's a smooth, slight vanilla scent, and plumps my lips SO well! very happy, and I will be purchasing the full size asap. This was applied on natural lips w no filler.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’m a lip plumper guru…tried em all! Always been less than impressed with most brands except Buxom. Their plumping glosses always gave me a boost, so I wondered what the difference was with this version. Let me tell you, it’s incredible! For one thing, the gloss is supper soft and luxurious. The plumping though is truly AMAZING!! I know products don’t work for every person, but wow oh wow, I cannot say enough good about this one. I’ve gone through 3 bottles and just tried the golden shimmer version too. I like to put it on at night also cuz I wake up with plumper, softer lips. I used to have constant chapped lips but this has actually kept my lips soft and poofy all winter. Whatever you do Buxom, please do NOT change or discontinue this baby! She’s a staple for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this it turns my lips dark red so the pink color doesn’t show but it’s beautiful and plumps but be very careful!! You can’t get this anywhere near your actual skin or it’ll turn bright red other than that it’s amazing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this lip gloss as I have read nothing but positive reviews about collagen-infused products. But I had a severe reaction to the plumping agent in this product. I can handle a little tingling, but my whole mouth and the skin around it turned bright red and inflamed within seconds (I look like a toddler that’s been eating a cherry popsicle). But to be fair, the inflammation does make me look like I have fuller lips at the moment 😂 … it just burns and itches. Lol People with less sensitive skin may not have a problem, but I have to return this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample size for 100 points and will not be purchasing the full size. There was a slight tingle, but instead of smoothing the lip lines like a lot of other lip plumpers,it made them look more chapped, red and overall uncomfortable. This is bad!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: On remarque après l'utilisation l'effet pulpeuse et un légé picotement

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Immediately after trying this plumping serum, i got a horrible allergic reaction. My lips were red, swollen, and burning. This has never happened to me before. I even swatched it on my hand, and the same exact thing happened. It stayed that way for hours.

reviews.review_title: Try the Plumping Cream Gloss Instead
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First off I must say, I am a huge fan of Buxom Plumping Cream Gloss. It beats out all other brands. Unfortunately, the Plump Shot caused me a severe allergic reaction. My lips were very swollen and even after washing off, I still had a stinging sensation and my lips became chapped even 24 hours later. My mom told me I looked like a guppy! So be very careful with this formula. For reference the Too Faced brand does not give me a reaction, BUT Eos lip balm and Laneige lip masks do produce the same reaction so steer clear if you are in the same boat.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It does plump my lips. I do say that it was a pretty good size for the 100 points.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: doesn't plump at all! The tingle isn't strong either, which some people might like. I have tried other lip plumpers that actually made a difference but not this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a small sample using 100 points, but was disappointed when it gave me a red ring around my lips for an hour. I had an allergic reaction. As for my mom, it was fine. I’ve tried plumping lipgloss before and never had this reaction. ￼

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If you aren’t a fan of the burn from the Too Faced plumper like i am, then you would absolutely love this. it’s not really sticky but it’s kind of thick in a comfortable nourishing way. The sensation is a minty cool tingling feeling. it plumps up your lips in a noticeable yet subtle way. it also does make your lips red which i love in a plumper.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: leaves my lips super hydrated. I do see some plumpness when using this product I love this for pictures. I can tell the difference.

reviews.review_title: Great Every Day Gloss - Not Plumping Though
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product. If you’re looking for a plumper, however, I would not utilize this product. It has a minty cooling feeling to it and makes my lips feel like velvet. Imo - it’s an amazing everyday gloss, but not a product that will make a large difference in plumpness.

reviews.review_title: my favorite lip product i have ever used!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: this product goes on really easily, isn't sticky, the applicator and packaging feel like really good quality! adds nice glossy finish and a bit of color to my lips, also def does plump ur lips (would not recommend kissing someone right after applying LOL). seriously is my favorite gloss i've used 10/10.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So, I enjoy viewing products I LOVE and address the 1 Star reviews. I purchased this from Buxom Cosmetics' original site and have been wearing it ever since it arrived. I can say that if you don't feel the tingling sensation, your lips have to be numb. To me, the tingling sensation feels like my lips are itching so it made me look in the mirror and that's when I noticed it... my lips were so plump and juicy! As long as I wasn't having an allergic reaction, the tingle does not bother me.  As far as the texture, this is definitely not sticky. This is coming from a woman who LOVES sticky lip gloss and this isn't it. But this is probably the only non-sticky lip product that I actually love. It's smooth. it allows your lips to breathe and have time apart from each other when you talk. I applied this on my lips when they were dry and cracked and this lip gloss instantly smoothed and hydrated my lips.  The last thing I want to address is the application. Someone gave it 1 star and said that it gave them some kind of irritation around their lips... Sweetie, the directions specifically say to be sure to apply it only on the inside of the living of your lips. Don't go near the outside. Don't rate something 1 star if you cannot properly read the packaging and use it the way it's intended to be used.  I do favor the original plumping polish and creams, but this lip product is like a new race or ethnicity coming to America. You gotta give it a chance for what it actually is (based on its claims) and not for what you want it to be. This lip product is not claiming to be a Buxom Cosmetics Plumping Polish or Plumping Cream. It is PLUMP SHOT. A collagen-infused SERUM. Technically, it's not a gloss. It's a lip treatment. And this is the best lip treatment I have ever tried.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the clear for a change. I enjoy the small tingling sensation; it makes me feel confident! Compared to lip injection, the tingling is manageable. Lip injection hurt so bad I couldn’t  continue wearing it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this after Stephanie Marie gave it a rave review on her YouTube channel. It's plumping, hydrating and smooth. Not sticky at all. Just make sure to keep it on your lip area and not the skin, as it will irritate. I'm really happy with this product. Apparently there are colored versions of this, why isn't Sephora selling them? I want more!!
Don’t like the sticky texture not smooth at all didn’t give me that wow plump like other plumbers did didn’t really tell a difference at all not the best
I LOOOOOOOVE IT !!! 1000x better the any Too Faced 😳😳
J’utilise depuis peu et j’aime bien l’effet WoW que ça fait pour le moment ça me convient!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this on whim, I love the White Russian and wanted something clear. I wish I stuck to the White Russian, it just seems like it works briefly and then the effect fades pretty quickly. I feel like the White  Russian and that line has a longer lasting effect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this lip serum. First of all the packaging is so nice and sleek. It smells like a really nice peppermint that isn’t too strong. I love the texture of this stuff it goes on super nice and smooth. As for the effect, it gives them a subtle plump and really smoothes the wrinkles in your lips out. I have to use this before applying my lip liner. I wipe it off and do my lip combo as normal

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best lip plumping. I have used every Buxom plumping product, and this is my favorite. I naturally have really thin lips but this makes them look so full and the color is beautiful and natural. I get so many compliments after using this. The plumping last quite a while too!
So good! I love Buxom. This is perfect for my lips. Plus I love that it doesn’t sting/burn.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I feel like this is overhyped lip serum. it is definitely vrey hydrating but not as good as two faced lip injection. i will not spend money on this one again. It is over priced as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The tingly feeling was nice but this did not plump my lips in the slightest bit, it just made it look more red. i returned it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product rocks! I can tell the difference that it has made on my lips even when I don't have it on and my lips are dry.  They seem fuller even with only about a week of use.  I will definitely buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: the texture of this ‘serum’ is lovely: glossy but not sticky at all, doesn’t migrate, feels incredibly soft on the lips. I personally use lip products with peptides for longer-term benefits, so care less about immediate plump (which i believe will always be less than a lot of people want, regardless of the product).  I have noticed fullness after using this consistently. It is tingly, but not much more than the regular buxom glosses. highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This really works! Be sure to apply this towards the center of your lips. If it gets to close to the edge it makes the skin around your lips red….but this could actually be good if you want to over-line!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is so pretty. The color is subtle and still has the cooling plumping effect that makes my lips look super yummi@

Absolutely over hyped, does nothing it claims and a little dry. Not impressed at all. I don’t feel a tingling sensation at all and does not have a plumping effect. I don’t think this is worth the money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Normally love buxom gloss but I found this extremely lacklustre for the price.  I wish I had just purchased another gloss from them.  Plumps better, smells better, looks better and a better product than this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve tried every lip plumper out there and by far this is the best one! Love the tingling sensation and smell Not sticky at all Beautiful shade with a little of sparkle

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased the buxom because it was the only buxom lip gloss they carried!  I have been a faithful user for years!  I have 10 tubes at any given time!!! I am addicted to White Russian but use several other shades! I am terribly disappointed in this product!  It makes a red ring around my lip line and is nothing like the ones that I like to use!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff really plumps! I have pretty thin lips and this serum plumps them like no other product I've tried. It does tingle quite a lot, to the point of probably being uncomfortable for some, so be aware of that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing everyday gloss. This product goes on and looks like a gloss, but it isn’t super sticky. It leaves my lips plumped with a nice pinky red color. I have had multiple people ask me what lipgloss shade I am wearing after using this clear gloss!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: nice smooth lip gloss, only felt a slight tingle. didnt plump my lips

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I keep this lip serum in my purse it feels so amazing!! Nourishing, plumping, made my lips look better with or without it. And it can go over any lipstick as it’s clear, so I can enjoy the benefits of the collagen and plumping at any time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It does plump, not a whole lot. Beautiful bottle though, especially when you first open it, that frosted glass is gorg. However! This stuff tastes like chemicals! I couldn’t figure out why my lips would taste so gross when I licked them unconsciously after a few hours wearing this, but when I realized I removed it from my online shopping bag, won’t be repurchasing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Just seems to leave a thick coating on your lips, not plumping at all. Hard Candy from Walmart works 100% better than this. I was really disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For the price i was expecting a bit more. It does softens and smells nice, but does not plump and you have to keep re applying if you want your lips to not chap.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didn't have high expectations but... For actually making the lips appear bigger this one is my winner. I've tried quite a few that promise but this one so far delivers, temporarily of course

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the better lip treatments I’ve used. It doesn’t sting but has a light tingle and doesn’t irritate my sensitive lips. The plumping effects are decent and the formula is really nice. Not to sticky or thick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product works really good! Superior to any other plumper I have tried.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wasn’t expecting much out of this product but it blew my mind I’m instantly in love i can see myself always having this and needing this. It makes my lips plump and soft it’s perfection in a bottle

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I loved it, it worked really well and felt good not a bad burn at all but it made me brake out on my cheeks chin overall I think I would but it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Just got this today. I'm a newbie to plumpers but this worked immediately. Sent a pic to my sister and she agreed my upper lip especially was much fuller (I have extremely thin lips especially on top). I'm sold! Spicier than their glosses which I also love. I'll be putting this on every morning with my skin care before make up going forward.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an okay lip gloss. It doesn’t sting but it also doesn’t really show any plumping. I doubt I would but it again.

reviews.review_title: Glossy lips, smooth lips, buy it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product feels great on my lips - you can feel it working. It seems to bring an extra blood-flow to my liips so even with no colour added my lips get a nice rosey gliw from this plus a shine, I love. This is a new staple for me, my favourite clear gloss that is actually helping my lips stay ypung at the same time. I am going to follow a full lip regiment from now on with this as the ‘piece de resistance’ in the process.  This is a lovely, classy product in a nice frosted case, which feels weighty and substantial..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love it so much! Makes my lips nice and plump and feels amazing! Buxom has the best products!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It plumps your lips!! Highly recommend it as it really does what it promises

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I bought this because there was a lot of good reviews. Now, don get me wrong, it plumps a little. For me, I experienced no burn or sting. Maybe my lips are weird. I'm on the hunt for a really good one. But this is not slimy or super thick. Feels moisturizing and has a mint smell to me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love it !!! But it’s really not a typical gloss. I can’t be without it. My lips are soft and plump. Conditioned. I don’t feel a tingle just a little warm feeling. It makes my lips look Awesome !!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is the best lip plumping serum, But take extra care not to get it on the skin around the mouth as it goes quite red if you have sensitive skin. It gives your lips a great healthy pink color! my lips have lost a lot of pigment from working outdoors and I’m happy I found something light that corrects this during wear. A new staple for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’d say it works! I find it stings just a bit. My lips also turned bright red which I’m not sure if that’s normal? Wouldn’t repurchase solely due to the fact that it made my lips ridiculously red!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So hydrating and gives lips such a nice plump! Would recommend.

reviews.review_title: No Kylie Jenner Lips For Me…
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had high hopes for this product and was hoping that this would give me a true plumping effect like what I’ve seen in others pics on here. Sadly that was not the case for me. It does give a tingling sensation and makes my lips look hydrated but not necessarily plumping in the sense that my lips actually look fuller. I’m only giving this two stars because clearly this does work for some people as seen in picture reviews but it just wasn’t it for me..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! I can definitely see a difference in my lips after applying this product! I usually apply it a few minutes before applying my lipstick❤

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love Buxom glosses. I expected more plumping power from this product though. It adds some volume but not a very noticeable amount, it also wears off fairly quickly and leaves my lips really dry. I'll use it up, but won't be re-purchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is an amazing product! I put this on at bedtime and by the next morning, I could feel the difference even inside my mouth! I’m no spring chicken and my lips have gotten thinner over the year but now they’re back to their original fullness. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: LOVEEEEE Don't kiss your babies while wearing this though. Lolol it works tooo good & will make their skin plump. Lolol v scary before figuring out why.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I adore this serum so much. It’s a bit sticky like a gloss, and it has amazing plumping. It doesn’t burn like other ones I’ve tried, and has more of a minty fresh tingling feeling. I do however feel a burn if I get some outside of my lip line, or if I scrub my lips prior to application. It provides such a nice colour to your lips, and I comfortably wear it for about two hours before I think about reapplying. I try not to eat or drink with it as I don’t want to ingest any of the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love it !! The tingling is amazing and i feel a difference already and only been a few days

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought it and I really love it. Definitely recommend and it does tingle

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the buxom glosses but don't find they actually plump my lips. This does give more plumping, but the tingling sensation is super strong. the first time I used it I almost wiped it off. Be careful to not get on skin outside of lips as for me that caused an uncomfortable burning sensation. I think GrandeLip provides more plumping with less of a tingle/burn. However, I like that this one is not super tacky/sticky and not as shiny. If you have sensitive skin, I'd recommend trying in store first.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lip gloss works well but be prepared to reapply throughout the night. I am happy with this product because I expected that to be the case.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I know so many people love this plumping gloss but I had the worst reaction to it… If you are going to try it, I recommend doing a swatch on your skin prior to purchasing, because I have welts.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is my new go to! The perfect translucent gloss which plumps and hydrates at the same time! Not sticky after application and lips get that tingly feeling from the plump :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this plump shot, not necessarily for the plumping aspects.  It defines my lip line and brings out the natural color of my lips.  What I love about this Buxum Plump shot is the healthy benefits to my lips, hey are always chapped, peeling or split lips once I started.using thos there was an immediate change to healthy moist non chapped lips.  Love love love this has been a game changer for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing, make my already big lips even bigger and plumping asf

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this really feels like a serum that's made for your lips, it's a little thicker than your normal lip balm but thinner than a lip mask/butter, and it leaves a shine without feeling like a gloss. it's a little plumping but not to a ridiculous level and the tingling is cooling instead of burning like most plumping products. I let it sink in a bit and then put my primer or mask over it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received a mini sample of this and absolutely love it!!!!! Plumps, gives a nice natural color to my lips and bonus love the texture of it! Not sticky and glides on smooth. Will definitely buy the full size!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i usually can’t use lip plumper since my skin is so sensitive, they usually make me have a reaction all over my face, even though it just goes on my lips. this stuff plumps without the reaction. it feels just like a lip balm and actually hydrated my lips. i use this after i use a lip liner and i look like i got lip injections!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think it works great to soften the look of my lips!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: absolutely love. just as good if not better than too faced lip injection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this collagen plump shot!!! The too faced lip injection be a bit too much for me whereas this one works so well but also not over the top burning sensation. I LOVE the scent!!! Smells exactly similar to the dior lip glow balm which I pair the both of them for extra moisturization + the plump. It definitely does plump the lips but in a subtle healthy way (type of look) slight tingly feeling nothing irritating as other plump glosses can be irritating.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was pleasantly surprised with this. It is a bit stingy, but probably only bothersome if you have super sensitive lips. It gives lips great color and enough plumping for late 30’s thinning lips before resorting to fillers. In the after photo, I wiped the gloss off to just see the plumping and color effects.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a lip plumper fanatic and I can tell you that this does nothing to plump the lips.

reviews.review_title: Great product- short term and over time
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m at Rouge level due to my overpurchasing of lip balms/glosses and eyeliners. I only write reviews for the best or worst and I’m here to add to the five star reviews for this lip serum. Someone mentioned an old lip product I loved in the questions section and I agree that this is similar in effect and feel. Feel is nice- just heavy enough w out being too thick. It also has a slight plumping and smoothing effect, enough to be noticeable but w out the extreme effects of some other brands that plump while turning the edges of your lips a weird inflamed red. I use it before bed and in the morning and have noticed my lips looking healthier altogether. Perfect as we start moving out of masks in my state.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this!! Everyone else is commenting about the tingling feeling, I don’t really get that. Maybe a slight tingle but it’s not like other lip plumper where you can really feel it. There is a noticeable difference in plumping but it’s not dramatic where you no longer see your lip line. Just natural, fuller, younger looking lips. I also use it before I go to bed as a serum (bc that’s what the box said to do) and my lips just feel amazing in the morning. If you have used the too faced one that is great too (feel the burn) but that is my going out/event plumper. This is my everyday plumper not sticky at all like a gloss just nourishing. Definitely a beauty bag staple

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I put this on right before a video call and one of my coworkers messaged me immediately to say she loved whatever lipstick color I was wearing. It gave me just a bit of color from all the blood rushing to my lips.  It definitely has that tingly feeling so if you aren’t a fan of spicy lips, you won’t like it. I found that the tingle and plumping lasted about 45 mins.   Be careful about keeping it on your lips…I smudged it up above my mouth and had a little red mark for a bit

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for awhile now and it truly works. I should add that I’m a lip fanatic and have tried almost everything and use various different products for different results. But this is great for plumping and even gives my lips a nice pink/red color if I use enough; I assume because of the slight sting. Use a little and it’s more of a nice treatment balm. Definitely something I will continue to buy. I also use Buxom lip color and love that alone or on top. Recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t know if it plumps that much but I love the tingling feeling upon application, the fact that it tastes like mint chocolate chip ice cream, and it’s vegan. Will definitely repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This gives a great natural full lip look! You cannot tell you are wearing a plumping product when it is on, it just looks like a gorgeous lip gloss. My lips are noticeably fuller and the effect lasts for about two hours for me before I need to reapply. I have extremely dry lips and this is non-drying and moisturizing. It tingles at first, but does not burn. It tastes like a light vanilla mint but does not have an outside scent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i really love this serum. I use it every day. It really helps smooth out the lines on my lips and helps them look healthy. I love the tingly feeling when it starts to plump my lips. Of course, it's not a dramatic plumping, but it's noticeable enough to make me happy. I definitely recommend this serum.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It has a bit of a tingling sensation but that's about it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you want to see a transformation right in front of your eyes for your lips this is the Shot for you! The name is perfect for what this product does  No fillers added or needed just a Plump Shot will do!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was worried this would dry my lips.  It actually leaves them plumped & moisturized.   I used this over night as a treatment & wake up with a decent plump.   It replaced my BeautyBio plumper (Aerin rose balm too).  Love this stuff and buying 2nd tube.   It tingles for a few minutes, but not nearly as much as Too Faced - which are very drying on my lips.  I find this product works great when used ever night or day - for volume anyway.   Don’t expect miracles, but a very natural Healthy  plump.  Recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Excellent texture and packaging. I did not like the tingling ingredient as it migrated above my lip and left my skin irritated. Luckily noone saw it as I have bneen at home and wearing my mask.I wish Buxom would formulate this without the menthol.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I rarely write reviews, but I am in love with this stuff!! After only a few days, I definitely notice the fine lines in my limps are smoothed out. Perhaps a little plumping, but I have decently full lips already. I love the subtle minty tingle, and the pretty satin/glowy finish. It’s not sticky at all! I put it on right before bed, as well as several times throughout the day. I think I’m going to get a second one so I can keep one in my bag and one at home.

reviews.review_title: Not the best not the worst...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was debating whether to give this a lower rating because of the product and packaging.   I have used Buxom's lipgloss in dolly and I feel that the gloss has more of a plumping effect. I didn't really see a huge difference, I already have nice lips but I wanted a little mmph, and this didn't give me that. Compared to too faced, this doesn't really plump.   Compared to Too Faced plumping gloss, this has 1/3 of the tingling stingy sensation. If you find Too Faced plumping products too intense, the Buxom plump shot may be better for those who are sensitive.   The consistency is between a balm to a gloss, it is less sticky and shiny than a gloss. It is very similar to Selena Gomez's rare beauty lip glosses. You can definitely use this under other lip products, but if you do that just use one coat (you don't want to have product build up). If you want to wear this alone, I like to apply twice on my upper and bottom lips.   I can say this did keep my lips hydrated and soft. I apply it at night and wake up with soft lips.   Now on the packaging, the applicator is decent. I can't tell how much product is in the container, the bottle is very thick, so I feel like for the price, there should be more product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a City Lips girl so I couldn't wait to try this.. its very lite and liquidy.. didnt do much at all. Its going back .. did Nothing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted a plumping effect that was natural or buildable, for me this works. The tingling doesn't burn or irritate. My lips don't dry out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Don’t forget that it’s not real collagen as real collagen cannot be vegan. So it’s either misleading with its ingredients or with the statement about it being vegan

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoy the tingle. I enjoy the color it brings out in my lips. But this is not plumping. It's a tingling gloss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t know how but this works 100%. Your lips don’t sting like with two faced lips injection. They feel a bit cool and turn red, but no pain at all. The plumping is INSANE. I could not believe it. The texture is so velvety and thick, not runny gross gloss that gets all over the place. The applicator is decent, nothing special. The tube is well made, doesn’t waste product. 10 stars!

reviews.review_title: It gave my lips the pouty look!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just tried this lip serum yesterday and I like it! I did notice a little difference. Keep in mind if plumps your lips about 18% more so it's not suppose to be overly drastic. It did seem to work and gave me a more pouty lip look. I don't have a big top lip so it's harder to notice but worked best on my bottom lip. I still think it works better than other lip plump serum's I have tried. I attached some before and after lip pics.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the buxom glosses but this does not work at all. I bought bc of all the 5 star reviews but obvi they haven’t tried the faced lip plumper. This did nothing for me, it feels good not sticky but after a while it gives u that white ring in the inner lip. Also not that shiny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Trust me! This is the most effective and amazing plumping serum that I ever tried in my life. I literally felt I got filler on my lips after using this product :P

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best lip plumpers I’ve ever used! Lasts long & a little bit goes a long way! Will repurchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Ehhh slight difference in my lips. Slight tingle, comparable to the buxom coloured glosses. I will be returning it, it did not wow me and while the coloured ones give colour and plump this one doesn't live up to the plumping expectations alone to warrant keeping it with the high price tag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: WOW THIS WORKS!!! I’m absolutely in shock because this is the first lip plumper that actually made a noticeable difference. Apply it and watch your lips plump within minutes - it’s like magic !!! I was highly skeptical because I have wasted money on many so-called lip plumpers that did nothing. But with this one yes, my lips grew larger somehow!! Plumping effect lasted for several hours. Amazing product you need to try this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this! I put some on at night before bed and my lips seem softer and plumper in the morning. I will definitely purchase again once I run out. Tempted to buy a back up now before it sells out again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I fell in love with this plumping lip serum after the first application!! It’s amazing and I can always tell a difference in my lips. If you’re looking for a lip plumping product that does exactly what it says — this is it, sis!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I truly love this lip plumper. It is not a gloss if that’s what you’re looking for - this will simply fill in your lip lines and give a nice plump effect. It starts tingling after a few min, and you’ll notice a nice tint to your lips without feeling sticky. You can easily top it off with your favourite lipgloss!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I say this is it right hereeee!!! If you are thinking it won’t work I am telling you this is amazing !! I usually would use two faced Nd I mean it was working  but compared to this !!!! Buxom is my new fav!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is NOT messing around - out of every lip plumping product I’ve tried, and I have tried quite a few, this has given me the best results. Slight tingling after application that gets a little stronger after the first minute or so but the feeling doesn’t last long! A few minutes after applying it looks like I’ve gotten a flattering amount of filler. Really love this product!! It’s amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Holy grail !!! This must become permanent . I’ve tried different ones before but none worked on my lips. This surprised me in a good way . Super happy with this purchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Wow!!! This lip filler without the needle is amazing. Some tingling but not like others on the market. Soft plump hydrated lips. Formula is really nice and not sticky. I really love this product and will definitely bring getting more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been looking for a lip plumper that does not taste like cinnamon or burn like crazy and this one is perfect. It goes on like a lip balm/salve instead of a gloss right as a prep before your lip colour. It has a minty feel to it and it actually plumps my lips and fills in the lines on my lips (which is crazy considering how it doesn’t burn?). This is an awesome product, would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried many lip plumping products, and this one is the only one that really worked! It does tingle a little, but it gives such a nice and visible result! I’ll definitely order another one. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this product. My lips have never looked so soft and plump in my entire life. I've been using this product for about 2 weeks now at least once a day with a few days without.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is more of a lip treatment than a gloss. You can use it to prep your lips before any lipstick/gloss etc as it does make your lips fuller and more plump and reduces the appearance of lines. The texture is not gloss like at all, it’s not sticky and it’s not shiny or glossy so if you’re looking for something with high shine that plumps your lips this won’t be it. It’s more of a super smooth serum type of texture, very thin and the applicators only picks up a bit so you will need to go back in a few times but it spreads very well and evenly. It almost feels like a primer for your lips! Very tingly and pepperminty which I like as well and that feeling lasts quite a bit!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this to compare to the LAWLESS since it was out of stock anyway.  This went back the next day. Did absolutely nothing and after a few minutes it still felt like it was just sitting on my lips not absorbed at all or plumped. Nothing.  When this wore off it left me with dry skin around my water line on my bottom lip (common problem of mine) worse than it was before applying.  I hope LAWLESS gets back in stock soon.  There are way better products out there. This is awful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It works very well! Way better than the Too Faced version

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve always been skeptical of lip plumping serums just because they usually tend to burn a lot and not really fulfill on lasting results. This one from Buxom however is the complete opposite, I only felt tingling on my first application which was barely even noticeable. I saw the plumping effects take action rather quickly after putting on the gloss and added a nice dark pink pigmentation on my lips. This serum gives a nice subtle plump to your lips and looks very natural. I’m very happy with this purchase and really exceeded my expectations. I also love that it’s clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you are looking for a wow plumping effect, this is not it. I don't really feel as if my lips are plumped, and any fuller look is really do tovthe shine and hydration. I will keep using it until it is finished in the hope that long term use will do something but as of now it really didn't do anything...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was pleasantly surprised when I tried this product! So much so I bought two more after my first! I saw it was a limited edition (BUXOM KEEP IT), and hey, 20% off Sephora sale is a perfect time!  This is described just like its name; It's a lip serum. I wouldn't say it's a gloss because it feels like the serums I use on my face. It's also not sticky at all! It coats the lips very nicely, and I can see my lips plump up, lines smoothed and turn a nice cherry red. It does have a tingle, but it is not uncomfortable, and the scent is very nice; it reminds me of Christmas time peppermint. I would say this plumper works! Compared to the too-faced plumper, I lost my interest in it, and this buxom one beats it hands down! Compared to the Dior lip maximizer, I feel like both do the lip filling and plumping, but again Dior is a lip gloss, and this buxom is a lip serum (it does give a nice glass-like shine to the lips).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product feels similar to Too Faced’s Lip Injection- but not as tingly with MUCH better results. It looked like I had work done on my lips after only applying a thin layer. It is INCREDIBLE! I highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Plumps up your lips and makes them a little more pink. It has a tingling feeling at first but that goes away just leaving more plump lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okay this is exactly what I wanted for so long but it  just didn’t exist anywhere. I just wanted a plumper that you could wear underneath your favorite lip colors.  Rather than a gloss, this is more like a satiny finish lip primer serum that fattens up your lips. And it works better than any other lip plumper I’ve tried.  I’m super happy with it. 10/10 :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This actually works! I’ve used the Sephora Collection lip plumper, which was good for what you paid for, but with this one you can definitely feel and see a difference! You don’t need much, but the product is also limited edition so I’ll definitely buy one more before it disappears.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried many lip plumpers and this one is the best I ever tried!  I do have lip fillers but this plumps them even more!  Love this!

reviews.review_title: many many I love it very much it feels like mint
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: many many I love it very much it feels like mint I love it if you see the difference

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: OMG this actually worked! I have never had a plumper work for me besides tingling. I love it! I think the reason the applicator doesn’t pick up a lot is because you seriously don’t need a lot and you definitely don’t want to accidentally go outside the lines. It did make my lips pinker, in the picture I didn’t add colour. But it didn’t make it...that odd plump where it’s bigger in one spot. That’s...just my mouth unfortunately. I will definitely be buying this again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So good. Feels very nourishing and definitely plumps. After 5 minutes I saw that my lips were plumped and looked more red. Love it! Tingling can’t even be felt.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It has a very nice texture, not sticky at all, kinda like an oil but a little thicker, glides very smoothly. The applicator is a little hard and doesn’t pick up a lot of product. The tingling is bearable, nothing terrible. It DOES plump, I’d say for me, even better than Dior. Be careful with the application because if you get it on the outer part of your lips it will burn a little an change the color of the skin like a burn. I really liked it and think I will keep it as a treatment since it feels hydrating as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Plump lips ✔️ Juicy lips ✔️ Tingly sensation ✔️  The tingly sensation is there. However as long as you apply the product as indicated you should be fine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So far so good. I applied and within a few seconds I felt tingling and in one minute I had bigger fuller lips. It did end up stinging more for a few seconds only.  BE CAREFUL because I accidentally applied it on the upper lip area between the nose and it swelled up weird and it was an annoying feeling that looked like a red spot.
